embed.description: This just shows how i Blitzcrank is just an over priced shiny model made from low quality plastic , just kidding the fact is that Blitzcrank once was a happy golem beep booping on the Rift ,till Riot nerfed his W ,his weak body couldn't take that nerf ,he's now suffering i tested this bug on Classic skin and i Blitzcrank skin ,it only happened on the i Blitzcrank skin ,also this bug is on live server NA ,i tested this on the PBE but it never happened

replies.body: I think they are gonna fixx this bug but it looks very funny
